name: Dancing Flame¹
descriptions: Dancing Flame is a Sorrows tribal found at the burial mounds in the year 2281.
Dancing Flame is a Sorrows warrior found protecting the Sorrows burial mounds. He only appears during the quest Sanctity of the Dead.
Dancing Flame appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Honest Hearts.

topics.response_text: You friend of Sorrows, yes? Together we smash White Legs that defile holy places, yes?

topics.topic_text: No, I smash White Legs alone. You stay here so you not get dead.
topics.response_text: Hmph. Since you are friend to Sorrows... we go. But you kill White Legs!

topics.topic_text: Just get out of here, you're no match for hardened White Leg warriors.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Because you are friend to Sorrows... very well. We go. Angry ghosts will do for White Legs.

topics.topic_text: Sure, whatever. We go smash White Legs.
Just wait here a few minutes. Don't do anything crazy.
